welcome_message_body: "Welcome to beautiful San Juan Capistrano, home to historic landmarks, enchanting streets, and a charming small-town vibe. Get ready to experience the city's unique charm and soak up its rich history. Enjoy your stay and explore all that this wonderful city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for airlines such as American Airlines, Delta, and United.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for airlines such as Alaska Airlines, Frontier, and Southwest.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. No login or password required.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
